verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for help <S%H5833><s%>, and rely <S%H8172><s%> on horses <S%H5483><s%>, and trust <S%H982><s%> in chariots <S%H7393><s%> because they are many <S%H7227><s%>, and in horsemen <S%H6571><s%> because they are very <S%H3966><s%> strong <S%H6105><s%>, but they look <S%H8159><s%> not unto the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, neither seek <S%H1875><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>!

Yet he also is wise <S%H2450><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, and will not call back <S%H5493><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%>, but will arise <S%H6965><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of the evil-doers <S%H7489><s%>, and against the help <S%H5833><s%> of them that work <S%H6466><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

Now the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> are men <S%H120><s%>, and not God <S%H410><s%>; and their horses <S%H5483><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and not spirit <S%H7307><s%>: and when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall stretch out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, both he that helpeth <S%H5826><s%> shall stumble <S%H3782><s%>, and he that is helped <S%H5826><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%>, and they all shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto me <S%H738><s%>, As the lion and the young lion <S%H3715><s%> growling <S%H1897><s%> over his prey <S%H2964><s%>, if a multitude <S%H4393><s%> of shepherds <S%H7462><s%> be called forth <S%H7121><s%> against him <S%H2865><s%>, will not be dismayed at their voice <S%H6963><s%>, nor abase <S%H6031><s%> himself for the noise <S%H1995><s%> of them <S%H3068><s%>: so will Jehovah of hosts <S%H6635><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> to fight <S%H6633><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and upon the hill thereof <S%H1389><s%>.

As birds <S%H6833><s%> hovering <S%H5774><s%>, so will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> protect <S%H1598><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; he will protect <S%H1598><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> it <S%H6452><s%>, he will pass over and preserve it <S%H4422><s%>.
Turn <S%H7725><s%> ye unto him from whom ye have deeply <S%H6009><s%> revolted <S%H5627><s%>, O children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For in that day <S%H3117><s%> they shall cast away <S%H3988><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his idols <S%H457><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and his idols <S%H457><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, which your own hands <S%H3027><s%> have made <S%H6213><s%> unto you for a sin <S%H2399><s%>.

And the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, not of man <S%H376><s%>; and the sword <S%H2719><s%>, not of men <S%H120><s%>, shall devour <S%H398><s%> him <S%H5127><s%>; and he shall flee from <S%H6440><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and his young men <S%H970><s%> shall become subject to taskwork <S%H4522><s%>.

And his rock <S%H5553><s%> shall pass away <S%H5674><s%> by reason of terror <S%H4032><s%>, and his princes <S%H8269><s%> shall be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at the ensign <S%H5251><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, whose fire <S%H217><s%> is in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and his furnace <S%H8574><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
